item.title: Graph-R1: Unleashing LLM Reasoning with NP-Hard Graph Problems
item.description: arXiv:2508.20373v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: Reasoning Large Language Models (RLLMs) have recently achieved remarkable progress on complex reasoning tasks, largely enabled by their long chain-of-thought (Long CoT) capabilities. However, developing these Long CoT behaviors relies heavily on post-...<br><br><small><strong>Source:</strong> arXiv | <strong>Keywords:</strong> LLM, fine-tuning, reasoning, arxiv, large language model | <strong>Relevance:</strong> 100%</small>

item.title: QAgent: An LLM-based Multi-Agent System for Autonomous OpenQASM programming
item.description: arXiv:2508.20134v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: Noisy Intermediate-Scale Quantum (NISQ) devices have begun to exhibit early quantum advantages on classically intractable problems, spanning physics simulations to Gaussian boson sampling.
